summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department, authorizing preparation of plans, specifications and estimates for the improvement of West Marginal Way Southwest from First Avenue South to Iowa Avenue Southwest, Iowa Avenue Southwest from West Marginal Way Southwest to a point approximately 150 feet northwesterly of Southwest Spokane Street and of Marginal Place Southwest from West Marginal Way Southwest to Southwest Spokane Street and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
